SQL.statement: CREATE REGULAR TABLESPACE APPLE MANAGED BY DATABASE USING (FILE 'APPLE' 5120) EXTENTSIZE 16 OVERHEAD 12.5 PREFETCHSIZE 16 TRANSFERRATE 0.13 BUFFERPOOL "IBMDEFAULTBP" DROPPED TABLE RECOVERY ON
CREATE TABLE SALES (CUSTOMER VARCHAR(80) not null primary key, REGION CHAR(5), YEAR INT)ORGANIZE BY DIMENSIONS (REGION, YEAR)IN APPLE
